events.content: Motion: This House would replace high-stakes standardized tests with portfolio-based assessment.
Proposition frame: portfolios capture creativity, critical thinking, and sustained effort, while test-centric systems reward short-term cramming and amplify inequity.
Opposition frame: standardized measures enable comparability, protect against grade inflation, and provide policymakers with the longitudinal data needed to fund interventions.
